exmls.content:
<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="HandlerSkin" width="500" height="500" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image source="light_png" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Rect height="500" width="500" fillAlpha="0" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="HomeSceneSkin" width="1136" height="640" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:ns1="*">
	<e:Rect height="900" width="1136" fillColor="0xCE0203"/>
	<e:Image id="bg" source="handBg_png" y="0"/>
	<e:Image id="p1" source="p1_png" x="70" y="42" visible="false"/>
	<e:Image id="p2" source="p2_png" x="71" y="41" visible="false"/>
	<e:Button id="bBtn" x="710" y="309">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="alphaBtn_png" source.down="light_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Button id="aBtn" y="308" x="906">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="alphaBtn_png" source.down="light_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay0" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Rect id="directionBg" height="636" width="656" x="3" y="2" fillAlpha="0"/>
	<ns1:Handler id="handler" x="-3" y="0" skinName="HandlerSkin" height="637" width="652"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="PreloadSceneSkin" width="1136" height="640" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="preload_jpg" horizontalCenter="0.5" verticalCenter="-80"/>
	<e:Label id="progressLabel" text="Loading...0%" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="120" width="232" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="ResultSceneSkin" width="1136" height="640" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Group height="1136" width="640" rotation="90" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0">
		<e:Image source="result_bg_jpg" width="640" height="1136"/>
		<e:Label id="waveLabel" text="99" x="198" y="766" textColor="0xFC0101" width="37" height="30" size="25" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
		<e:Label id="heroRankLabel" y="766" textColor="0xFC0101" height="30" text="99" textAlign="center" width="48" verticalAlign="middle" size="25" x="526"/>
		<e:Label id="killLabel" y="826" textColor="0xFC0101" size="25" text="99" textAlign="center" width="45" verticalAlign="middle" height="30" x="141"/>
		<e:Label id="killRankLabel" y="826" textColor="0xFC0101" height="30" text="99" textAlign="center" width="46" verticalAlign="middle" size="25" x="374"/>
		<e:Label text="坦克大战！" x="32" y="700" textColor="0xEB9040" size="40" fontFamily="微软雅黑"/>
		<e:Label y="930" textColor="0xEB9040" text="分享朋友圈，呼朋唤友，重拾童年的乐趣！" fontFamily="微软雅黑" size="25" x="34"/>
		<e:Label y="767" text="无限模式击溃" fontFamily="微软雅黑" size="25" x="33" textColor="0xFBF9F9"/>
		<e:Label y="767" textColor="0xFBF9F9" text="。" fontFamily="微软雅黑" size="25" x="583"/>
		<e:Label y="827" textColor="0xFBF9F9" text="。" fontFamily="微软雅黑" size="25" x="433"/>
		<e:Label y="827" textColor="0xFBF9F9" text="击杀坦克" fontFamily="微软雅黑" size="25" x="33"/>
		<e:Label y="827" textColor="0xFBF9F9" text="辆，击杀榜排名" fontFamily="微软雅黑" size="25" x="193"/>
		<e:Label y="767" textColor="0xFBF9F9" text="波疯狂坦克，英雄榜排名" fontFamily="微软雅黑" size="25" x="248"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>
